data.title: Himanshu Ashok Malhotra - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Himanshu Ashok Malhotra: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Indian actor known mainly for his television roles. From 2010 to 2012, he starred in the daily soap opera Bhagonwali-Baante Apni Taqdeer. He's also participated in reality shows like Nach Baliye and Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi.

Before Fame

He made his television debut as a contestant on India's Best Cinestars Ki Khoj.

Trivia

He posts motivational videos on his himanshuashokmalhotra Instagram account, where he's gained upwards of 600,000 followers. His himanshuashokmalhotra TikTok account also features motivational videos and has racked up more than 950,000 followers.

Family Life

He married actress Amruta Khanvilkar in 2015. His brother, Mohit Malhotra, is also an actor.

Associated With
